slide.title: Подготовка
slide.markdown:
# Часть 1. Подготовка
**1.1.** Установите JDK (Java Development Kit) [Java SE 8u221](https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html)
**1.2.** Установите среду разработки [IntelliJ IDEA Community 2019.2.1](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/other.html)
